name: Please Support Ukraine
description:
Hello Figmates! 

Usually, I try to extend Figma's possibilities, go beyond its limits, try to help others to do the same... but now I'm asking for your help.


My country suffers and the situation around my native city Kharkiv is pretty tense. Volunteers do more than they can and need money support. 

Every coin may help.

All funds will be redirected to people who work directly on places in Ukraine.


My PayPal:

vitalii.solokub@gmail.com


Thank you and peace to all of you!
